WorkItem.ClosedComment: The Snowstorm helm has mp5 and you are running OOM, you need to select raid buffs that increase your mana pool/regen. Otherwise, pick up gear/gems that will do that so you aren't running OOM.
WorkItem.Description:
On v2.3.2 and loading my old Enh. character file, I came across an awkward gear recommendations, such as recommending [Snowstorm Helm](Resto. gear) over [Snowserpent Mail Helm](Enh. gear).
After some efforts to adjust this, I unticked 'Use Mana Calculations' in the Options Tab, and it came back normal, at least what it used to look like.
 
I don't precisely know what that option does, but my guess is that RAWR concludes my character needs more mana regen. to DPS fully between SRs, which in reality, is not true for I still have about 20% of mana left when my SR is back.
 
I consider this could be an issue.
My char. file attached for reference. Thank you.

Comments.Message: I loaded in your .xml, and was able to reproduce.  However, I noticed that you only have self buffs selected.  The problem you describe seems to fix itself when you select a few raid buffs (notably AI, replenishment, JoW)
